titleInfo.title: Mel Street and Faron Young at the Top Brass Club

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Mel Street, Faron Young, Johnny Paycheck, and the Ferlin Huskey Show at the Top Brass Club. Poster features metal photoplates of Mel Street, Faron Young, Johnny Paycheck, and Ferlin Huskey. Poster was printed for job no. 16374. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22632.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
